mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIME_TBL A SELECT TIME_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{emplId} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , NULL , '업무' , NULL , NULL FROM DUAL WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM TIME_TBL B WHERE B.EMPL_ID = #{emplId} AND B.TIME_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE))
mapper.update: UPDATE TIME_TBL SET TIME_END = SYSDATE , TIME_ACCRUE = SYSDATE - TIME_START WHERE TO_CHAR(TIME_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND EMPL_ID = #{emplId} AND TIME_END IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT A.TIME_NO , A.EMPL_ID , A.TIME_DATE , TO_CHAR(A.TIME_START, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS TIME_START , TO_CHAR(A.TIME_END, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS TIME_END , A.TIME_STATE , A.TIME_CONTENT , TRUNC(B.TIME_ACCRUE*24) || '시간' || TRUNC(MOD(B.TIME_ACCRUE*24,1)*60) || '분' || TRUNC(MOD(B.TIME_ACCRUE*24*60,1)*60) || '초' AS TIME_ACCRUE FROM TIME_TBL A, (SELECT SUM(TIME_ACCRUE) AS TIME_ACCRUE FROM TIME_TBL WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId } AND TO_CHAR(TIME_DATE, 'W') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'W')) B WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId } AND TO_CHAR(A.TIME_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT A.TIME_NO , A.EMPL_ID , A.TIME_DATE , TO_CHAR(A.TIME_START, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS TIME_START , TO_CHAR(A.TIME_END, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS TIME_END , A.TIME_STATE , A.TIME_CONTENT , TRUNC(B.TIME_ACCRUE*24) || '시간' || TRUNC(MOD(B.TIME_ACCRUE*24,1)*60) || '분' || TRUNC(MOD(B.TIME_ACCRUE*24*60,1)*60) || '초' AS TIME_ACCRUE FROM TIME_TBL A , (SELECT SUM(TIME_ACCRUE) AS TIME_ACCRUE FROM TIME_TBL WHERE TO_CHAR(TIME_DATE, 'W') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'W')) B WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId } AND TO_CHAR(A.TIME_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
